actions: Breaks up Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation and drains abscesses.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
With Tao Ren, invigorates the Blood for all types of Blood Stagnation.
Nourishes Kidney Yin, clears Lung Heat, moistens the Lungs, sedates Fire,
Cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
Tonifies the Spleen and nourishes Stomach, Kidney and Lung Yin.
With Dang Shen, for Lung, Kidney and Spleen Deficiency.
Drains Heat, generates Fluids, relieves toxicity, expels pus and reduces swelling.
Breaks up and drives out Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation and disperses lumps and masses.
Tonifies the Middle Jiao, augments Qi, nourishes the Blood and promotes the generation of Body Fluids.
Stops bleeding, transforms Blood Stasis and invigorates the Blood.
Nourishes Stomach, Kidney and Lung Yin

symptoms: A localized pricking sensation in the chest and back
manifestations.tongue: Dark blue or red with echymoses
manifestations.pulse: Deep, sluggish and choppy or Choppy and uneven

notes: Decoct all of the herbs except Tian San Qi. Drink the decoction and the take the Tian San Qi with water.
